description:
Penny Pax plays a naive little blonde girl who is very excited to take her first trip out of the country, to Mexico!!! Unfortunately for her, she ends up in the wrong hostel at the wrong time and gets taken to the station for possession of drugs that aren't even hers! Scared, in a foreign country, unable to understand what is being said about her or what is going to be done to her Penny struggles to get free but is defeated and brutally fucked by the corrupt gang of cops!!!!
It's also Penny Pax's FIRST EVER GANGBANG AND DP!!!!!!
title: Poor Little American Girl Trapped in Mexico FIRST GANGBANG AND DP EVER!!!!!!
